bind.calculate: if(( not(selected(../family_planning/current_method,'cocs') and selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'cocs')) and not(selected(../family_planning/current_method,'dmpa_im') and selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'dmpa_im')) and not(selected(../family_planning/current_method,'pops') and selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'pops')) and not(selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'condoms')) and not(selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'cycle_beads')) and not(selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'lam')) and not(selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method,'sayana_press')) and count-selected(../family_planning/new_fp_method) > 0), 'true', 'false')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Exit the form since the eligible woman is not in

bind.relevant: ../using_modern_fp = 'yes' and not(selected( /fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/family_planning/current_method , 'lam')) and not(selected( /fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/family_planning/current_method , 'condoms')) and not(selected( /fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/family_planning/current_method , 'cycle_beads'))

../using_modern_fp = 'no' and not(selected( /fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/family_planning/most_recent_method , 'lam')) and not(selected( /fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/family_planning/most_recent_method , 'condoms')) and not(selected( /fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/family_planning/most_recent_method , 'cycle_beads'))
count-selected(../why_stop) > 0 and (selected(../why_stop, 'get_pregnant') or selected(../why_stop, 'menopause') or selected(../why_stop, 'risk_factors'))

/fp_registration_ke-v4-jef/eligibility/in_the_household = 'yes' and ../../pregnant = 'false' and ( (../used_modern_fp = 'no' or ../using_modern_fp = 'no' or ../using_modern_fp = 'yes' or selected(../why_stop,'side_effects') or selected(../why_stop,'not_sexually_active') or selected(../why_stop,'spouse_refused') or selected(../why_stop,'no_reason') or selected(../why_stop,'not_afford') or selected(../why_stop,'was_pregnant')) and not (selected(../current_method, 'tubal_ligation')) and not (selected(../why_stop, 'get_pregnant') or selected(../why_stop, 'menopause') or selected(../why_stop, 'risk_factors')))

bind.jr:constraintMsg: No Risk' should not be selected in conjunction with other options

bind.constraint: not(selected(., 'lam') and (../breastfeeding = 'no' or ../breastfeeding_duration >= 180)) and not(selected(.,'cocs') and ../breastfeeding = 'yes' and ../breastfeeding_duration < 180)
bind.jr:constraintMsg: LAM can only be selected for exclusively breastfeeding mothers / Cannot select COCs if mother has been exclusively breastfeeding.

bind.relevant: count-selected(../new_fp_method) > 0 and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'condoms')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'cycle_beads')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'lam')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'sayana_press'))

not(selected(../current_method,'cocs') and selected(../new_fp_method,'cocs')) and not(selected(../current_method,'dmpa_im') and selected(../new_fp_method,'dmpa_im')) and not(selected(../current_method,'pops') and selected(../new_fp_method,'pops')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'condoms')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'lam')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'cycle_beads')) and not(selected(../new_fp_method,'sayana_press')) and count-selected(../new_fp_method) > 0
selected(../new_fp_method, 'cocs') or selected(../new_fp_method, 'pops') or selected(../new_fp_method, 'condoms') or selected(../new_fp_method, 'sayana_press')

bind.constraint: not( (not(selected(../current_method,'cocs') ) and selected(.,'cocs')) or (not(selected(../current_method,'pops') ) and selected(.,'pops')))
bind.jr:constraintMsg: You can not initiate a family planning method. Refer client to health facility to receive the FP method

My spouse does not want me to use FP

input.label: Thank client for their time

select1.label: Was the spouse included in the health education session?
Does the client accept to take on or switch to another FP method?

item.label: I am using a traditional method of Family Planning

input.label: **Thank the client for their time**

**

Refer client to health facility to discuss suitable FP methods.

** **Thank the client for their time and follow up in 3 days**

**

select1.label: Which method would you like to take?

input.label: **Educate the client on the dangers of using COCs during exclusive breastfeeding. COCs reduce milk production during breastfeeding.**
**Educate client about possible side effects. Thank them for their time and follow them up after 30 days.**
**Educate the client on using LAM during breastfeeding and boosting with another FP method after 6 months of exclusive breastfeeding.**

**Remind client of the alternative FP methods that are available and the limitations of condoms. Let them know to call you if they would like to discuss further. Follow up in one month to continue FP education.**

**Remind client of the alternative FP methods that are available and the limitations of cycle beads. Let them know to call you if they would like to discuss further. Follow up in one month to continue FP education.**
**Educate client about possible side effects. Thank them for their time and follow them up after 7 days to see if they have any side effects.**

**

You can not initiate a family planning method. Refer client to health facility to receive the FP method

**

select1.label: **Message to CHV:** Did you administer the FP method?
Which method did you administer?
Who administered Sayana press?

input.label: Be sure you Submit to complete this action.
Client Details
years old
Estimated delivery date:
Educate Client
_Educate client on all available modern family planning methods_
_Educate client on the possible side effects of modern family planning methods (headache, bleeding changes)_
_Educate client to visit a hospital if any of the side effects persist for more than 1 month_
After a live birth:
Couples should use an effective FP method of their choice continuously for at least two years before trying to become pregnant again.
For first pregnancies among youth:
Youth should delay first pregnancy until they are at least 18 years old
To delay a first pregnancy, youth should use an effective FP method of their choice or practice abstinence.
Refer to a health facility
Refer to the health facility for risk factors.
High blood pressure
Heart disease
History of blood clots
Chronic medication
Kidney and liver disease

Refer the client for initiation of the new method
The client is exclusively breastfeeding and she is on COCs. Refer her to get suitable family planning methods
Refer client to the health facility for counselling on FP methods
Follow Up
Remember to follow up the client after 3 days to see if they have visited the facility
